alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Polk County Higher Elevations; Northern Scott County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 9:21AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Logan, Scott and northwestern Polk Counties through 945 AM CDT... At 921 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Hartford to near Heavener Runestone State Park to 6 miles north of Muse. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waldron... Mansfield... Beauchamp... Cardiff... Oliver... Echo... Morgan Springs... Queen Wilhelmina State Park... Mountain Fork... Bates... Black Fork... Cauthron... Black Fork Mountain Wilderness... Winfield... Hon... Lucas... Liberty... Rich Mountain... Eagleton... Ione... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
